ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Illusion Iksar for Evil Races
ygData.msgSnippet: You can stop killing goblins (for now, at least).  To improve your factions with the crusaders, there is a trooper in the field of bone that you can turn bone
ygData.messageBody:
You can stop killing goblins (for now, at least). To improve your factions
with the crusaders, there is a trooper in the field of bone that you can
turn bone chips in to that will give you faction with the crusaders, as well
as + faction with the residents of calibis. I've heard that the factions
gained are very substantial... I've collected over 100 chips with my troll
and am hoping this will be enough to move into calibis and be able to buy
and sell (you cant talk to the merchants with dubious factions)

Cogg - RZ

----- Original Message -----
From: Shawn Alley <shawna@...>
To: <eqenchanters@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 1:31 PM
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Illusion Iksar for Evil Races


> with illusion iksar, benovolence, and a few hundred goblins/sarnaks killed
> I'm up to dubious with the troopers and warlord. The crusaders are
"Scowls
> at you Threateningly".
>
> Azara Sparklemeister
> - Shawn
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Art Jay [mailto:ajay@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 1:33 PM
> To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Illusion Iksar for Evil Races
>
>
> Well, I'm 18th DE and curious. So I spent an evening...killed almost 100
> goblins and sarnaks, with appropriate faction increases. Even found
> out there are at least three different goblin factions. (News to me...)
>
> Well, even after that and with Alliance cast, the guards are still
scowling.
> Any ball-park figure on how MANY kills are needed? I'd really like
> to turn in the couple of dozen brains and torches. ;)
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Garett <osmosis@...>
> To: <eqenchanters@egroups.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 3:16 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Illusion Iksar for Evil Races
>
>
> > Not only goblins, but sarnaks as well... both will increase your Firona
> Vie
> > faction, as well as your factions with the Legions of Calibis (Iksar
> > Troopers).
> >
> > Cogg - RZ
